definition: Dr Sun Yat-sen's mausoleum in Nanjing
China/Chinese/surname Zhong
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
mound/tomb/hill/mountain

sentences.english: The Sun Yat-Sen Mausoleum is like a huge green leaf that warms and comforts the heart of every people in Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 中山陵象一片巨大的綠葉，溫潤着每個南京人的心靈。

sentences.english: He was buried on a hillside outside Nanjing, not far from Sun Yat-sen’s mausoleum.
sentences.chinese: 他被埋葬在南京郊外的一個小山丘邊，離中山陵不遠。
最著名的景點是中山陵。

sentences.english: In my opinion, we should go to see the Sun Zhongshan Mausoleum.
sentences.chinese: 依我看，我們應該去瞻仰中山陵。

sentences.english: Away from this, but also on Purple Mountain are a great many other attractions, as follows.
sentences.chinese: 除了中山陵之外，紫金山上還有許多著名的旅遊景點。

sentences.english: Nanjing has many attractions, such as Sun Yat-sen, Jiming Temple, Stone Town.
sentences.chinese: 南京有許多名勝古蹟，比如中山陵，雞鳴寺，石頭城。

sentences.english: We had a wonderful time in the Zhongshan Tomb last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期天我們在中山陵玩得很痛快。

sentences.english: Have higher ticket prices, 100 yuan now.
sentences.chinese: 中山陵有着較高的門票價格，100元吧。

definition: Ming tombs in Nanjing, tomb of founding Ming emperor Zhu Yuanzhang 朱元璋[Zhu1 Yuan2 zhang1], a World Heritage site
